titleStmt.title: Satan sifting, or, The oyl of joy for the spirit of heaviness

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Holt for Tho. Parkhurst ...,

notesStmt.note: Wing reads: "On the oyl of joy", apparently in error.
Pages 30-98 tightly bound in the filmed copy. Pages 24-103 photographed from Bodleian Library copy and inserted at the end.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
